title: bookstack-public
description: Tweak of Nashosted and Selfhosted's Bookstack portainer Template to add APP_URL .env - Boostack is a free and open source Wiki designed for creating beautiful documentation. Feautring a simple, but powerful WYSIWYG editor it allows for teams to create detailed and useful documentation with ease.
note: Default login is admin@admin.com with a password of password. The database created is called bookstackapp and the database user is called bookstack
